title: Develop games, tools, and much more
subtitle: Learn 2 Earn
para: We will begin the development of educational games, materials, and capture the flag events that the community will participate in and earn $THINK tokens. We have some fun ideas to both educate our community, and reward those who engage in the process.

title: Transitioning to The Locke Era of Education
subtitle: Celebrating Alain LeRoy Locke
para: As the year comes to a close we will begin to complete the process of transitioning to a new era for Thinkr centered around education. We will begin the work of building an educational platform, and tools for learners to help them better succeed in their quest for knowledge. We’re passionate about what’s to come next, and we hope you are too.
